file_insights.description: Added ExecuteAsync() method for non-blocking tool execution

patterns_discovered: Asynchronous execution pattern with buffered channel
Result channel design with automatic closure
gotchas_discovered: Potential goroutine leaks mitigated by using buffered channel
Need to handle context cancellation in async execution
recommendations: Add error handling examples in method documentation
Consider adding timeout mechanism to async method
Implement unit tests for ExecuteAsync() method
